source: have your head in the clouds
lemma: have one's head in the clouds
definitions: To be daydreaming or lost in thought, often to the point of being impractical or unaware of one's surroundings.
To be unrealistic or to have impractical ideas or plans.
examples: She always has her head in the clouds during math class.
He's a dreamer, always with his head in the clouds.
Stop having your head in the clouds and focus on the task.
